=== Physical recordable media archiving ===
=== Physical recordable media archiving ===
* [[ISO image|ISO]] - The generic file format for most optical media, including [[CD-ROM]], [[DVD-ROM]], [[Blu-ray Disc]], [[HD DVD]] and [[Universal Media Disc|UMD]].
* [[ISO image|ISO]] - The generic file format for most optical media, including [[CD-ROM]], [[DVD-ROM]], [[Blu-ray Disc]], [[HD DVD]] and [[Universal Media Disc|UMD]].

* NRG - The proprietary optical media archive format used by [[Nero_AG|Nero]] applications.
+
* [[NRG (file format)|NRG]] - The proprietary optical media archive format used by [[Nero_AG|Nero]] applications.
* IMG - For archiving MS-DOS formatted [[floppy disks]].
* IMG - For archiving MS-DOS formatted [[floppy disks]].
* ADF - ''[[Amiga Disk Format]]'', for archiving [[Amiga]] floppy disks
* ADF - ''[[Amiga Disk Format]]'', for archiving [[Amiga]] floppy disks
